comment._content: Agnes Nestor (1880-1948), suffrage and labor activist, cofounder of the Women's Trade Union League (WTUL) and the International Glove Workers' Union (IGWU): en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Agnes_Nestor

comment.author: 23103743@N05
comment._content: Date written on negative is 3/7/14. NYT of Feb 18, 1914 query.nytimes.com/gst/abstract.html?res=9E07E2DF163AE633A... announced her appointment to a commission (by President Woodrow Wilson) on vocational education.
